trans-unit.source: """a"" "- empty string, string with letter and string with space
trans-unit.target: "" "a" " " -空字符串，带字母的字符串和带空格的字符串

trans-unit.target: 0 1 NaN Infinity -数字

trans-unit.target: nullundefined

trans-unit.source: Conclusions
trans-unit.target: Conclusions

trans-unit.source: A bit excessive, I know.
trans-unit.target: 我知道,有点过份了。

trans-unit.source: A lot of answers, and a lot of different possibilities!
trans-unit.target: 答案很多,也有很多不同的可能性!

trans-unit.source: All the previous answers are good, but this will be even better. Use the !!(not not) operator.
trans-unit.target: 先前的所有答案都不错，但这会更好。 使用 !! （ 不是 ）运算符。

trans-unit.source: All these answers are nice.
trans-unit.target: 这些答案都很好。

trans-unit.source: Also, in case you consider a whitespace filled string as "empty".
trans-unit.target: 另外,为防万一你认为一个充满空格的字符串是 "空的"。

trans-unit.source: And then for all methods I perform speed test case str = "" for browsers Chrome v78.0.0, Safari v13.0.4, and Firefox v71.0.0 - you can run tests on your machine here
trans-unit.target: 然后，对于所有方法，我对浏览器Chrome v78.0.0，Safari v13.0.4和Firefox v71.0.0都执行速度测试用例 str = "" -您可以在此处在计算机上运行测试

trans-unit.source: As of now there is no direct method like string.empty to check whether a string is empty or not. But in your code you can use a wrapper check for an empty string like:
trans-unit.target: 目前还没有像string.empty这样的直接方法来检查一个字符串是否为空。但在你的代码中,你可以使用一个包装器检查空字符串的方法,比如:

trans-unit.source: As per the comment from Constantin, if strVar could some how end up containing an integer 0 value, then that would indeed be one of those intention-clarifying situations.
trans-unit.target: 根据康斯坦丁（Constantin）的评论，如果strVar最终可以包含一个整数0值，那么这确实是意图明确的情况之一。

trans-unit.source: Both do the same function. Typecast the variable to Boolean, where str is a variable.
trans-unit.target: 两者执行相同的功能。 将变量类型转换为布尔值，其中 str 是变量。

trans-unit.source: But I cannot be sure that variable is a string, doesn't contain only spaces (this is important for me), and can contain '0' (string).
trans-unit.target: 但我不能确定这个变量是一个字符串,不只包含空格(这一点对我来说很重要),而且可以包含 "0"(字符串)。

trans-unit.source: But it always returns true for Number type of JavaScript primitive data types like _.isEmpty(10) or _.isEmpty(Number.MAX_VALUE) both returns true.
trans-unit.target: 但是对于 _.isEmpty(10) 或 _.isEmpty(Number.MAX_VALUE) 之类的JavaScript基本数据类型的 Number 类型，它总是返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Checks for strings that are either empty or filled with whitespace.
trans-unit.target: 检查字符串是否是空的或填充了白区。

trans-unit.source: I didn't see a good answer here (at least not an answer that fits for me)
trans-unit.target: 我在这里没有看到一个好的答案(至少没有一个适合我的答案)。

trans-unit.source: I have not noticed an answer that takes into account the possibility of null characters in a string. For example, if we have a null character string:
trans-unit.target: 我没有注意到有一个答案考虑到字符串中的空字符的可能性。比如说,如果我们有一个空字符的字符串。

trans-unit.source: I perform tests on macOS v10.13.6 (High Sierra) for 18 chosen solutions. Solutions works slightly different (for corner-case input data) which was presented in the snippet below.
trans-unit.target: 我在macOS v10.13.6 （High Sierra）上针对18种选定的解决方案进行了测试。 解决方案的工作方式略有不同（对于极端情况下的输入数据），如下面的代码片段所示。

trans-unit.source: I saw this question, but I didn't see a JavaScript specific example. Is there a simple string.Empty available in JavaScript, or is it just a case of checking for ""?
trans-unit.target: 我看到了这个问题 ，但是没有看到JavaScript特定的示例。 是否有一个简单的 string.Empty 在JavaScript中可用，还是仅检查 "" 一种情况？

trans-unit.source: I use a combination, and the fastest checks are first.
trans-unit.target: 我用的是组合,最快的检查是第一。

trans-unit.source: I use:
trans-unit.target: 我用的是。

trans-unit.source: I usually use something like this,
trans-unit.target: 我通常用这样的东西。

trans-unit.source: I would not worry too much about the most efficient method. Use what is most clear to your intention. For me that's usually strVar == "".
trans-unit.target: 我不会太担心最有效的方法。 使用最清楚您意图的内容。 对我来说，通常是 strVar == "" 。

trans-unit.source: If one needs to detect not only empty but also blank strings, I'll add to Goral's answer:
trans-unit.target: 如果不仅需要检测空字符串,还需要检测空字符串,我就补充一下Goral的答案。

trans-unit.source: If you just want to check whether there's any value, you can do
trans-unit.target: 如果你只是想检查是否有价值,你可以做的是

trans-unit.source: If you need to check specifically for an empty string over null, I would think checking against "" is your best bet, using the === operator (so that you know that it is, in fact, a string you're comparing against).
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要专门检查是否有一个空字符串，而不是null，那么我认为使用 === 运算符来检查 "" 是最好的选择（这样您就可以知道它实际上是您要与之进行比较的字符串） ）。

trans-unit.source: If you need to make sure that the string is not just a bunch of empty spaces (I'm assuming this is for form validation) you need to do a replace on the spaces.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要确定这个字符串不只是一堆空位(我假设这是为了表单验证),你需要在空格上做一个替换。

trans-unit.source: Ignoring whitespace strings, you could use this to check for null, empty and undefined:
trans-unit.target: 忽略了whitespace字符串,你可以用这个来检查空、空和未定义的字符串。

trans-unit.source: In the below snippet I compare results of chosen 18 methods by use different input parameters
trans-unit.target: 在下面的片段中,我通过使用不同的输入参数对所选的18种方法的结果进行了比较。

trans-unit.source: It covers a lot of cases like {}, '', null, undefined, etc.
trans-unit.target: 它涵盖了许多情况，例如 {} ， '' ， null ， undefined 等。

trans-unit.source: It is concise and it works for undefined properties, although it's not the most readable.
trans-unit.target: 它很简洁,对未定义的属性很管用,虽然它不是最可读的。

trans-unit.source: It returns false for null,undefined,0,000,"",false.
trans-unit.target: 对于 null,undefined,0,000,"",false 返回false 。

trans-unit.source: It returns true for string "0" and whitespace " ".
trans-unit.target: 对于字符串“ 0”和空格“”，它返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: It works on a null string, and on an empty string and it is accessible for all strings. In addition, it could be expanded to contain other JavaScript empty or whitespace characters (i.e. nonbreaking space, byte order mark, line/paragraph separator, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 它可以在空字符串和空字符串上工作,并且对所有字符串都可以访问。此外,它还可以扩展到包含其他JavaScript空字符或空白字符(如非分隔符、字节顺序标记、行分隔符等)。

trans-unit.target: 同时，我们可以使用一个函数来检查所有“空”，例如null，undefined，''，'，{}，[] 。 所以我只是写了这个。

trans-unit.target: 或使用类型铸造。

trans-unit.target: PS .： 您不需要检查typeof ，因为它甚至在进入方法之前都会爆炸并抛出。

trans-unit.source: PS: In JavaScript, don't use line break after return;
trans-unit.target: PS：在JavaScript中，请勿在 return 之后使用换行符；

trans-unit.target: 于是,我决定自己来回答。

trans-unit.target: 如果要检查 '' 空字符串，可以使用下面的简单代码为您完成此工作：

trans-unit.source: The closest thing you can get to str.Empty (with the precondition that str is a String) is:
trans-unit.target: 您可以最接近 str.Empty （以str为字符串为前提）是：

trans-unit.source: The type check is needed in order to avoid runtime errors when test is undefined or null.
trans-unit.target: 当 test undefined 或为 null 时，为了避免运行时错误，需要进行类型检查。

trans-unit.source: There's no isEmpty() method, you have to check for the type and the length:
trans-unit.target: 没有 isEmpty() 方法，您必须检查类型和长度：

trans-unit.source: There's nothing representing an empty string in JavaScript. Do a check against either length (if you know that the var will always be a string) or against ""
trans-unit.target: JavaScript中没有任何内容代表空字符串。 检查 length （如果您知道var始终是字符串）或 ""

trans-unit.source: To check if it is an empty string OR a logical equivalent for no-value (null, undefined, 0, NaN, false, ...):
trans-unit.target: 检查它是否为空字符串或无值的逻辑等价物(null,undefined,0,NaN,false,...)。

trans-unit.source: To check if it is exactly an empty string:
trans-unit.target: 要检查它是否正好是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: To test its nullness one could do something like this:
trans-unit.target: 为了检验其空性,可以这样做:

trans-unit.source: Use cases and results.
trans-unit.target: 使用案例和结果。

trans-unit.source: Using this you can also make sure that string is not undefined or null too. Remember, undefined, null and empty are three different things.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个也可以确保字符串不是未定义或空。记住,未定义、空和空是三个不同的东西。

trans-unit.source: With that said, wrap it up in a method like:
trans-unit.target: 说到这里,用一种方法把它包起来,比如。

trans-unit.source: Without a doubt for quick and simple implementation the winner is: if (!str.length) {...}
trans-unit.target: 毫无疑问，快速简便的实现是赢家： if (!str.length) {...}

trans-unit.source: You can easily add it to native String object in JavaScript and reuse it over and over...
trans-unit.target: 您可以轻松地将其添加到JavaScript中的本机String对象中，并一遍又一遍地重复使用...

trans-unit.source: You can test it with this regular expression:
trans-unit.target: 你可以用这个正则表达式进行测试。

trans-unit.source: You can use lodash: _.isEmpty(value).
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用lodash ：_.isEmpty（value）。

trans-unit.source: You cannot have !! or only if(value) since if you check 0 it's going to give you a false answer (0 is false).
trans-unit.target: 你不能拥有！ 或仅 if(value) ,因为如果您选择 0 ,它将给您一个错误的答案（0为否）。

trans-unit.source: You could also go with regular expressions:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以用正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: You need to start checking if it's undefined. Otherwise your method can explode, and then you can check if it equals null or is equal to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 你需要开始检查它是否是未定义的。否则你的方法会爆炸,然后你可以检查它是否等于null或者等于空字符串。

trans-unit.source: and you can call it this way:
trans-unit.target: 而你可以这样称呼它。

trans-unit.source: check that var a; exist
trans-unit.target: 检查 var a; 存在

trans-unit.source: the simple solutions based on !str,==,=== and length are fast for all browsers (A,B,C,G,I,J)
trans-unit.target: 基于 !str ， == ， === 和 length 的简单解决方案对于所有浏览器（A，B，C，G，I，J）都是快速的

trans-unit.source: the solutions based on the regular expression (test,replace) and charAt are slowest for all browsers (H,L,M,P)
trans-unit.target: 对于所有浏览器（H，L，M，P），基于正则表达式（ test ， replace ）和 charAt 的解决方案最慢

trans-unit.source: the solutions marked as fastest was fastest only for one test run - but in many runs it changes inside 'fast' solutions group
trans-unit.target: 标记为最快的解决方案仅在一次测试运行中是最快的-但在许多运行中,它在 "快速 "解决方案组内发生变化

trans-unit.source: trim out the false spaces in the value, then test for emptiness
trans-unit.target: 修剪值中的 false spaces ，然后测试是否为 emptiness
